title: That Olde Christmas Magic
description: Start with five gold rings, wrap with ribbons and bows, add a paddle, and let the party begin!Angels might get wings with every bell that rings, but four couples find that bells and magic this Christmas send them flying on wings of love.~ Victor and Terri find their spell with five words and Five Gold Rings.~ Greg and Lisa's hearts are Tied Up in a Bow and lessons in trust.~ Sheldon has A Paddle for Patti and she learns every now and again it's good for the soul.~ Edward learns All Amelia Wants for Christmas and fulfills her wildest dream.
author: Morgan Q. O'Reilly
